name: Cat Guns [Demo]
description:
Cats fighting on mecha in a 3v3 death-match arena

Features:

  • Build your mecha choosing your weapons
  • Super-fast 3 minutes matches
  • Lot's of random-generated silly cats
  • 3v3 deathmatches with random people

*** CAT GUNS is brought to you by BAD JOKES ***

We are a team of 3 guys very passionate about hats and game development. Cat Guns is our biggest effort so far and we hope you'll enjoy it as much as we do.  But remember:

*** CAT GUNS is just a Prototype ***

Please, be kind. This is a very early prototype that gives you the idea of our vision. But it is of course very rough and it's still missing most of the industry standard.

*** BAD JOKES at your service ***

So please let us know if you like it or not! We will really appreciate any kind of suggestion of feedback!

See you in the Arena!
